#sidebar ListCommandsSidebar

=== RPUSH _key_ _string_ ===
=== LPUSH _key_ _string_ ===
_Time complexity: O(1)_

 Add the _string_ value to the head (RPUSH) or tail (LPUSH) of the list
 stored at _key_. If the key does not exist an empty list is created just before
 the append operation. If the key exists but is not a List an error
 is returned.

== Return value ==

[ReplyTypes Integer reply], specifically, the number of elements inside the list after the push operation.
